sourceitem.name: Lyrics
sourceitem.comment: Shows the lyrics for the current playing song. Very big database.

sourceitem.name: Explorer View
sourceitem.comment: This will browse to the folder of the current playing item.

sourceitem.name: Wikipedia (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Shows the wikipedia page for this artist.

sourceitem.name: Foxytunes (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Foxytunes shows you information about the playing artist.

sourceitem.name: Google Search (Song)
sourceitem.comment: Search with Google for this song.

sourceitem.name: YouTube Search
sourceitem.comment: Look for videos of the playing file on YouTube

sourceitem.name: Yahoo! Search
sourceitem.comment: Search with Yahoo for this song.
